Microphone.description: What type of microphone have you connected? The Playstation Eye is a cheap and good option.

Speaker.description: What type of microphone have you connected? The Playstation Eye is a cheap and good option.

Speaker volume.description: How loud should the audio playback be? Default is 100. This is a system wide settings, and will be set when the add-on is loaded.

Token.description: To be allowed to get information on all your devices, you have to create an 'authorization' code. It's basically a very long password. You can generate it yourself under settings.

Metric.description: Check the box to use metric values instead of imperial units. For example: temperature in Celcius or Fahrenheit.

Debugging.description: Debugging allows you to diagnose any issues with the add-on. If enabled it will result in a lot more debug data in the internal log (which can be found under settings -> developer -> view internal logs).
